lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Mariah Carey/Walter Afanasieff
[00:01.00] 作词 : Mariah Carey/Walter Afanasieff
[00:08.200]I don't want a lot for Christmas
[00:13.300]There is just one thing I need
[00:17.300]I don't care about presents
[00:21.100]Underneath the Christmas tree
[00:24.100]I just want you for my own
[00:28.100]More than you could ever know
[00:33.700]Make my wish come true...
[00:39.400]All I want for Christmas
[00:45.400]Is you...
[00:56.700]I don't want a lot for Christmas
[01:01.000]There is just one thing I need
[01:04.000]I don't care about presents
[01:07.000]Underneath the Christmas tree
[01:10.600]I don't need to hang my stocking
[01:13.600]There upon the fireplace
[01:17.600]Santa Claus won't make me happy
[01:20.600]With a toy on Christmas Day
[01:23.600]I just want you for my own
[01:26.600]More than you could ever know
[01:29.600]Make my wish come true
[01:33.600]All I want for Christmas is you...
[01:39.600]You baby
[01:42.900]I won't ask for much this Christmas
[01:46.200]I won't even wish for snow
[01:49.200]I'm just gonna keep on waiting
[01:53.200]Underneath the mistletoe
[01:56.200]I won't make a list and send it
[01:59.200]To the North Pole for Saint Nick
[02:02.900]I won't even stay awake to
[02:05.300]Hear those magic reindeer click
[02:08.600]'Cause I just want you here tonight
[02:11.600]Holding on to me so tight
[02:14.600]What more can I do
[02:17.600]Baby all I want for Christmas is you
[02:25.500]You...
[02:29.500]All the lights are shining
[02:31.500]So brightly everywhere
[02:35.500]And the sound of children's
[02:37.500]Laughter fills the air
[02:40.900]And everyone is singing
[02:45.200]I hear those sleigh bells ringing
[02:47.200]Santa won't you bring me the one I really need - won't you please bring my
[02:51.200]baby to me
[02:53.200]Oh I don't want a lot for Christmas
[02:57.200]This is all I'm asking for
[03:00.200]I just want to see my baby
[03:03.200]Standing right outside my door
[03:06.200]Oh I just want him for my own
[03:09.200]More than you could ever know
[03:13.200]Make my wish come true
[03:15.200]Baby all I want for Christmas is
[03:22.200]You...
[03:28.200]Baby, all I want for Christmas is you
tlyric:
[by:18PROHIBITION]
[00:08.200]圣诞佳节里我别无所求
[00:13.300]唯有一事让我殷切期望
[00:17.300]我不在乎精美礼物
[00:21.100]堆放在圣诞树下的
[00:24.100]我只想身旁有你陪伴
[00:28.100]能够超乎你所想像的
[00:33.700]让我的愿望即将成真...
[00:39.400]圣诞佳节我想要的
[00:45.400]就是你...
[00:56.700]圣诞佳节里我别无所求
[01:01.000]唯有一事让我殷切期望
[01:04.000]我不在乎精美礼物
[01:07.000]堆放在圣诞树下的
[01:10.600]我不想要将长袜
[01:13.600]悬挂在壁炉上
[01:17.600]圣诞老人无法让我开怀大笑
[01:20.600]即便在圣诞日送来礼物
[01:23.600]我只想身旁有你陪伴
[01:26.600]能够超乎你所想像的
[01:29.600]让我的愿望即将成真
[01:33.600]圣诞佳节我想要的就是你...
[01:39.600]是你啊 亲爱的
[01:42.900]今年圣诞节我别无所求
[01:46.200]甚至不期盼瑞雪的降临
[01:49.200]我只是会继续等待
[01:53.200]就在圣诞幸运枝下
[01:56.200]我不会写下心愿 将其送出
[01:59.200]送到北极的圣诞老人手里
[02:02.900]我甚至不会保持清醒
[02:05.300]去倾听驯鹿踏来的奇妙响声
[02:08.600]因为今夜我只想有你陪伴
[02:11.600]紧紧将我拥入怀中
[02:14.600]我还能奢求什么呢
[02:17.600]亲爱的 圣诞佳节我想要的就是你
[02:25.500]是你啊...
[02:29.500]这里到处灯火通明
[02:31.500]照亮了每一个角落
[02:35.500]孩童们的欢声笑语
[02:37.500]弥漫在空气之中
[02:40.900]人们都在载歌载舞
[02:45.200]我听到了雪橇的铃铛声
[02:47.200]圣诞老人能否实现我的唯一心愿 - 请求能够将你
[02:51.200]带来我身边
[02:53.200]圣诞佳节里我别无所求
[02:57.200]这是我的唯一请求
[03:00.200]我只想见到我的宝贝
[03:03.200]就站在我家门外
[03:06.200]我只想身旁有你陪伴
[03:09.200]能够超乎你所想像的
[03:13.200]让我的愿望即将成真
[03:15.200]亲爱的 圣诞佳节我想要的
[03:22.200]就是你...
[03:28.200]亲爱的 圣诞佳节我想要的就是你
